projects.name: Happy thoughts
projects.description: This project utilises GET and POST API calls to update the UI based on user interaction. User can send happy thoughts and like teh thoughts sent by others. Meanwhile the system will keep count on the number of likes and posts.

projects.name: Stress survey
projects.description: This project aims to get information from user on their stress level and provides with some suggestions. It implements multi-steps form and data validation to ensure the user answers each question as per the requirements.

projects.name: Music release
projects.description: This website provides a list of trendy albums from Spotify. User can sort albums and singles from the list and get the editor's pick on the sidebar. Each song and name of singer is linked to Spotify page for reference.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: This project fetches weather data from Open Weather API as well as location data from GeoLocation API. It allows user to serch for a specific city or share the location to display the weather conditions on the city in query.

projects.name: Book Library
projects.description: This website is a library for books. It provides a few of books in the database and also randomly recommend a book as per user's request.It also allows user to filter books based on genre and meanwhile sort books on the time of creation.

projects.name: Chatbot
projects.description: This is a simple chatbot which functions like the counter at a Pizzeria. The bot responds once the user answer the question and asks next question in a row. It also displays the loading animation while processing user's answers.
